Yannis Kokkos (Stage Director, Sets) Yannis Kokkos, Paola Mariani (Costumes), Anne Blancard (Dramaturgy), Michael Bauer (Lighting), Maxim Petrov (Choreography), Eric Duranteau (Video)
Ekaterina Semenchuk (Dalila) Gregory Kunde (Samson) Roman Burdenko (Le Grand Pretre de Dagon) Mikhail Petrenko (Abimélech)
Recorded on 25 Mai & 2 June 2016 at the Mariinsky (Saint Petersburg) Directed by Louise Narboni
